data.lyric:
[ti:Slide Away]
[ar:Miley Cyrus]
[al:Slide Away]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Slide Away - Miley Cyrus (麦莉·赛勒斯)
[00:04.76]Lyrics by：Miley Cyrus/Andrew Wyatt/Alma Miettinen
[00:09.52]Composed by：Miley Cyrus/Andrew Wyatt/Alma Miettinen
[00:14.29]Wooh wooh wooh
[00:20.77]Wooh wooh wooh
[00:26.06]Once upon a time it was paradise
[00:29.35]One upon a time I was paralyzed
[00:32.56]Think I'm gonna miss these harbor lights
[00:35.37]But it's time to let it go
[00:39.04]Once upon a time it was made for us
[00:42.39]Woke up one day it had turned to dust
[00:45.54]Baby we were found but now we're lost
[00:48.42]So it's time to let it go
[00:52.37]I want my house in the hills
[00:55.65]Don't want the whiskey and pills
[00:58.84]I don't give up easily
[01:01.98]But I don't think I'm down
[01:04.38]So won't you slide away
[01:06.25]Back to the ocean I'll go back to the city lights
[01:10.80]So won't you slide away
[01:12.64]Back to the ocean nahh nah nah you'll slide away
[01:17.40]So won't you slide away
[01:19.22]Back to the ocean I'll go back to the city lights
[01:23.77]So won't you slide away
[01:25.71]Back to the ocean nahh nah nah you'll slide away
[01:30.95]Once upon a time it was paradise
[01:34.17]One upon a time I was paralyzed
[01:37.38]Think I'm gonna miss these harbor lights
[01:40.26]But it's time to let it go
[01:43.88]Once upon a time it was made for us
[01:47.11]Woke up one day it had turned to dust
[01:50.38]Baby we were found but now we're lost
[01:53.19]So it's time to let it go
[01:57.25]Move on we're not seventeen
[02:00.49]I'm not who I used to be
[02:03.75]You say that everything's changed
[02:06.97]You're right we're grown now
[02:09.18]So won't you slide away
[02:10.98]Back to the ocean I'll go back to the city lights
[02:15.77]So won't you slide away
[02:17.60]Back to the ocean nahh nah nah you'll slide away
[02:22.10]So won't you slide away
[02:24.10]Back to the ocean I'll go back to the city lights
[02:28.71]So won't you slide away
[02:30.43]Back to the ocean nahh nah nah you'll slide away
[02:36.21]Move on we're not seventeen
[02:39.43]I'm not who I used to be
[02:42.72]You say that everything's changed
[02:45.92]You're right we're grown now
data.trans:
[ti:Slide Away]
[ar:Miley Cyrus]
[al:Slide Away]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.76]//
[00:09.53]//
[00:14.29]//
[00:20.77]//
[00:26.06]这里曾经一度是天堂般的存在
[00:29.35]想来我浑浑噩噩地过了许久
[00:32.56]我大概会想念这些星星点点的海港灯火
[00:35.37]但 是时候放手了
[00:39.04]曾几何时 这一切都装点着我们的幸福
[00:42.39]某一天醒来 皆化为尘土
[00:45.54]亲爱的 我们曾找到彼此 但眼下我们已然走散
[00:48.42]大抵是时候放手了吧
[00:52.37]我期待有座属于自己的山间小屋 享受隐匿的美好
[00:55.65]不愿觥筹交错 沉沦迷惘
[00:58.84]我虽不轻言放弃
[01:01.98]但我也没一蹶不振
[01:04.38]即便如此 你还不溜走吗
[01:06.25]回到你的自由之海 我也将重新踏入城市的星光下
[01:10.80]即便如此 你还不溜走吗
[01:12.64]回到那自由之海 你会就此溜走
[01:17.40]即便如此 你还不溜走吗
[01:19.22]回到你的自由之海 我也将重新踏入城市的星光下
[01:23.77]即便如此 你还不溜走吗
[01:25.71]回到那自由之海 你会就此溜走
[01:30.95]这里曾经一度是天堂般的存在
[01:34.17]想来我浑浑噩噩地过了许久
[01:37.38]我大概会想念这些星星点点的海港灯火
[01:40.26]但 是时候放手了
[01:43.88]曾几何时 这一切都装点着我们的幸福
[01:47.11]某一天醒来 皆化为尘土
[01:50.38]亲爱的 我们曾找到彼此 但眼下我们已然走散
[01:53.19]大抵是时候放手了吧
[01:57.25]一别两宽 我们不再年少莽撞
[02:00.49]我已不复从前模样
[02:03.75]你说 一切都变了
[02:06.97]没错 眼下我们都变成了稳重的大人
[02:09.18]即便如此 你还不溜走吗
[02:10.98]回到你的自由之海 我也将重新踏入城市的星光下
[02:15.77]即便如此 你还不溜走吗
[02:17.60]回到那自由之海 你会就此溜走
[02:22.10]即便如此 你还不溜走吗
[02:24.10]回到你的自由之海 我也将重新踏入城市的星光下
[02:28.71]即便如此 你还不溜走吗
[02:30.43]回到那自由之海 你会就此溜走
[02:36.21]一别两宽 我们不再年少莽撞
[02:39.43]我已不复从前模样
[02:42.72]你说 一切都变了
[02:45.92]没错 眼下我们都变成了稳重的大人
